name: Curse of Curiosity
description:
In this Metroidvania First-Person Platformer your goal is to satiate your curiosity of what dwells deep within this mysterious complex you've entered. Find movement abilities like Double Jump and Airdash and try to reach the deepest, furthest room before you run out of oxygen. You can recover oxygen by finding white orbs.

As you progress into the building, you are followed by a mysterious curse. This curse will chip away at your resistance and eventually kill you. You can boost resistance by finding purple orbs.

Controls:
WSAD - walk
Shift+WSAD - walk slowly
Space - jump
LMB - airdash (if you've unlocked it)

Credits:
developed by Moczan and WillQ
Cat by Poly by Google [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
Prototype Textures by Kenney
